titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Captain Hart, HM 6th Regiment, Tabriz

mods.abstract: The letter informs Hart that three sergeants and one corporal of His Majesty's 20th Regiment of Foot will march to Tabriz the following day. MacLeod informs Hart that he has advanced them money for expenses and has paid wages for one servant and six mules to accompany them. He requests that Hart adjust the amount of the advances. The men have been given four swords, three pistols and ammunition, which can be returned to MacLeod with the men whom they will relieve.
